alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 8:03AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. This lake effect snow band is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 800 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was located from Dunkirk to Derby to Orchard Park and Holland. The band was nearly stationary, just slowly drifting southward. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, Arcade, North Collins, Chaffee, Lake Erie State Park, Derby, East Concord and Wales Center. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 59. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
